title: 10 signature moves all Drake fans will know | CBC Music
text:
Drake is best known for his hit songs, but he's also created some of the most viral, meme-worthy visuals in pop culture. From his unique dance moves to his divisive courtside antics at Raptors games, the Toronto star knows how to get people's attention.

Below, illustrator Markus Wreland has broken down 10 of Drake's signature moves including his "Hotline Bling" dance, the viral dance challenge that "In My Feelings" inspired, that time he used a lint roller at a Raptors game and more.

What are your favourite Drake moves? Share them with us @CBCMusic.

(Markus Wreland/CBC)

For more of CBC Music's Decade of Drake coverage, including sneak peeks of CBC's eight-part Gem series as well as an interactive guide to the mogul's hometown, head to cbc.ca/music/decadeofdrake.
description: From courtside antics to viral music video moments, Drake's career has been filled with memorable moves.
